translations: 无目的的；无益的；缺乏决心的

sentences.sentence: Time may also be wasted in purposeless meetings.
sentences.translation: 时间也可能被浪费在无目的的会议中。

sentences.sentence: Since evolution has given rise to few, if any, purposeless physiological responset, it is logical to assume that crying has one or more functions that enhance survival.
sentences.translation: 既然进化产生了即使有也很少的、无目的的生理反应，我们就可以从逻辑上假设哭泣有一个或多个增强生存能力的功能。

sentences.sentence: Surely my existence cannot be so purposeless?
sentences.translation: 想必，我的存在不可能如此毫无意义吧？
